ISSUE.TITLE: weed upload not support flag "server" but the doc show wrong example.
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: It looks command "weed upload" not support flag -server any more, but the doc for this command still show an example "weed upload -server=localhost:9333 -dir=one_directory -include=*.pdf". Because we use a earlier version of seaweedfs, and we use '-server' frequent, hope there still support '-server' or at least keep the right doc . Thanks for the awesome seaweedfs
